meanings.sent1: The metal block was machineable, allowing the worker to easily shape it with the tools.
meanings.sent2: The wood was machineable, making it simple for the carpenter to carve intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn cookie dough proved to be quite machineable, as the baker struggled to roll it out smoothly.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a machineable puzzle, each thought easily dissected and analyzed.
meanings.sent5: The clay was so machineable that the sculptor effortlessly molded it into a beautiful vase.

meanings.definition: Able to be processed by a machine.
meanings.sent1: The fabric was machineable, allowing the sewing machine to stitch it quickly.
meanings.sent2: The data was machineable, enabling the computer to analyze it efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The cake batter was surprisingly machineable, smoothly mixing in the electric mixer.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a machineable code, easily deciphered by those who knew him well.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces were so machineable that the robotic arm assembled them with precision.
